title: Virtual Simulation-Based Education to Enhance CAM Communication Self-Efficacy in Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level basic clinical knowledge in nursing and foundational patient counseling skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening CAM communication competencies by combining virtual simulations via smartphone apps with traditional lectures in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain CAM risk-benefit assessment procedures with 80% accuracy through patient-case-based virtual simulations
Learners can improve self-efficacy in CAM-related patient counseling by 20% compared to pre-assessment after virtual simulation training
Learners can demonstrate the ability to apply CAM communication strategies across diverse clinical scenarios in at least two out of three formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
